elements.Text: Are you worried about applying to the remote job?

elements.name: Unstable WiFi_Work/Career Development_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.

elements.text: In the real world, sometimes things don't go well. It's important to have some stories that end negatively to teach you to manage your anxiety when negative situations arise!
